name: Zhadnost: The People's Party
summary:
Welcome to Zhadnost, the "most popular game on Bizzarnian state run television"! Bizzarnia, a small communist nation has kidnapped contestants for this its favourite game show and is playing them against each other to compete for their freedom.

In this party game for two to four people you will be in near constant action. You will play mini-games with such names as Propaganda, and Eye Spy. Try to force your opponents into harder games and uncover secrets about their characters. All characters are live action including the host.

name: Zhu Zhu Pets
summary: Zhu Zhu Pets are innovative, realistic, interactive, plush, and artificially intelligent hamsters that talk and move around in their own playsets. Zhu Zhu Pets include two play modes: nurturing mode where the hamsters coo and purr and adventure mode where the hamsters explore their habitat with intelligent audio and mechanical responses to various habitat stimuli. Over a dozen add-ons can be purchased to build an ever-evolving hamsterworld for your hamster to play in and explore.

name: Z.H.P. Unlosing Ranger vs. Darkdeath Evilman
summary: Crawl through randomly-generated dungeons to power up the weakest superhero in the world's history (you) and defeat the final boss threatening the Earth: Darkdeath Evilman! Customize everything imaginable, from your stats to your appearance; from your secret base to your theme song! Z.H.P. will scratch all your RPG itches!

name: Zhombre, the Undead Hombre
summary: Zhombre, The Undead Hombre is an Action Platformer set in a post apocalyptic world 100 years after the zombie invasion. Humans are the apex predator and the Undead have been forced to find refuge on the outskirts of human encampments. Zhombre wields his brothers severed leg in his fight against the human scourge. Follow him from The Barren Wastelands into the Neon city of the Living in his quest for vengeance as he uncovers the truth of the past.

name: Zheros
summary: Zheros is a new generation 3D beat 'em up, based on the genre hallmarks, above all: smashing hordes of enemies and punching stuff. From bizarre characters and encounters to strange locations, find out what mystery awaits you at the end of your journey.

name: Zhust: The Illusion Soul
summary: Zhust: The Illusion Soul is third person Action, Hack & Slash game. It has Combat system with various combo and fast-paced attack moveset.

name: Zhu Zhu Pets 2: The Wild Bunch
summary: Take care of hamsters and race them.

name: ZhuZhu Pets 2: Featuring the Wild Bunch
summary: Zhu Zhu Pets: Featuring The Wild Bunch features super cute action with fun and furry pals. Fans will get to care for and play with all of their Wild Bunch friends plus the original Zhu Zhu hamsters. On Wii, multiplayer will allow families and friends to pick up and play.

name: Zhu Zhu Puppies
summary: A Nintendo DS exclusive game in the Zhu Zhu Pets franchise.

name: Zhulik.exe
summary:
Feel like a trader and buy magical product cheaper to sell it with extra charge.
Grow your capital in the fascinating and colorful adventures of the Rogue.
Earn money by using the simple "Buy&Sell" scheme.
Put money to the bank and earn more!
Spend money on upgrades

name: Zhōngguó Xiàngqí
summary: An adaptation of Chinese Chess for Genesis. Released only in Taiwan.

name: ZhanDou
summary:
Developed by KX Games, Zhandou is one of the first MOBA style games available on VR and Non-VR platforms.
Along with Zhandou's unique theme, playable characters, environments, and fighting system, Zhandou will be the first game based on ancient Chinese civilization and mythology. The game is considered "early release"

name: Zhmyshenko Valery Albertovich
summary: You play for an old bivas Valera, and you need to collect baby bons, beers and run away from guys from the club boys

name: ZHive
summary: ZHive is a small and simple strategy game where you have to direct and support the undead on the map by selecting the areas where you want them to spawn and then direct them to a target area. But be careful, think strategically.

name: Zhu Zhu Babies
summary:
9 different Zhu Zhus, play with Patches, Nugget, Winkie, Jilly, Scoodles, Pip Squeek, Mr. Squiggles, Chunk and Num Nums! + 10 babies
Multiple Zhu Zhu toys including, the hamster ball, car and skateboard
30 unique levels filled with secret passages, food, coins, upgrades, and babies
Care for each of your Zhu Zhu pets to keep them happy

name: Zhu Zhu Pets: Quest for Zhu
Zhed
summary: ZHED is an instant classic puzzle game. Based on a simple mechanic, it builds onto increasingly complex puzzles that challenge you to a level you would not imagine. No timers, no clocks, no stars and no tricks, just pure puzzles for you to enjoy.

name: Zhen Ben Xi You Ji: The Adventures of Monkey
summary: Zhen Ben Xi You Ji is a 2D fighting game for the NES. It is based on the ancient Chinese novel Journey to the West.

name: Zhōngguó Xiàngqí: Cánjú
summary: "Chinese Chess-Endgame" is a casual chess game.

name: Zheros: The forgotten land
summary: "The ZHEROS mission continues in a new exciting setting: conquer the forgotten land of the east and put an end to the crazy plot of Dr.Vendetta. Fight once again as a member of the ZHEROS squad to save the galaxy from evil."

name: Zhazari VR
summary: Zhazari is a game that will take you to a beautiful but dark world. You will come face to face with the menacing monsters that have taken over the kingdom, through the king's bad decisions. You are the last hope to bring peace back to the towns. Do you have the courage to stand up to fight?

name: Zhmurki
summary: Zhmurki is an isometric action title set in Russia of the 1990s. It is based on the events of the same name movie from 2005.

name: Zhēng Shàngyóu
summary: Zhēng Shàngyóu was a cancelled Chinese iQue game for the iQue DS. It would have been part of the chess and card series and playable online with the NetCard (NC卡) in the Game Boy Advance slot.

name: Zhiel's Mystery
summary: Zhiel's Mystery follows Chief Detective Jacob Snydor and his path to rescue the mayor of Zhiel's from the infamous criminal, Edmund Newton. In his path, Newton has established intricate rooms full of puzzles and obstacles for Snydor to complete to rescue the mayor.

name: Zhuzi Subdues Demons
summary: This is a CRPG game, you can operate a team of 5 people to explore together. Combat is real-time, but allows players to pause the game mid-game to give orders to their team members. The controls refer to Dragon Age origins and Dragon Age II. If you like Dragon Age, you can try to play this game

name: Zhigu Military Exorcist
summary: Horror FPS single-player shooter. The military exorcist fighting against weaves of demons and undead trying to invade the Earth. The game includes weapons, shooting, portals, interesting environment and different enemies with different abilities.

name: Zhen Jia Hou Wang
summary: A platformer based off Journey to the West.

name: Zhi Huan Wang: Shou Bu Qu
Zhen: Shattered Legacy
summary: Zhen: Shattered Legacy is a Twin-Stick, Action-Adventure where you play as a Robot Warrior Monk sent to investigate a decrepit realm in order to restore the righteous way of Kung Fu.

name: Zhuishu
summary: Can you hear it? The faint sound coming from an abandoned radio, calling out for forgotten children. Trace back a chilling tale lost to time and unravel the mysteries hidden within the ruins. Who is silently watching you? And who lurks within the fog, waiting for answers?

name: Zhouyi Six Lines Divination Game
summary: Zhouyi Six Lines Divination Game is an innovative simulation game for spiritual sustenance, aimed at helping players explore the mysteries of the future through the combination of ancient divination wisdom and modern AI technology.

name: Zhong Xing New Village
summary: ZHONGXING NEW VILLAGE is a multiplayer online game centered on regional revitalization, featuring the history and guided tours of attractions and regional revitalization stories, encouraging more people to participate in revitalization activities in Zhongxing New Village.

name: Zhàn jiǎ Online
summary: Zhàn jiǎ Online was a multiplayer online mini-MMOARPG. The artstyle is based on Japanese and Korean style of fantasy themes.

name: Zhàn Qí Dàlù
summary:
“Zhàn Qí Dàlù” is a 2D turn-based tactical strategy RPG with simple controls and rich gameplay.
You play as a commander who recruits units, captures cities, and engages in battles of wits against beasts and mages.
The game features over 30 types of units and summons, each serving a unique strategic purpose.
Terrain mechanics play a key role—different terrains affect unit attributes and combat performance. Smart use of terrain can even determine the outcome of an entire battle.
Includes 11 story campaign stages and 8 free maps for endless tactical fun.

name: Zhúlù Hàn Mò
summary: Zhúlù Hàn Mò invites you to the exciting and transformative Three Kingdoms era at the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, where you can embark on a journey to dominate the world and unify the Central Plains with unprecedented freedom, depth and historical authenticity.

name: Zhōng Yān Yǔ Lóng Tóngxíng
summary: "Zhōng Yān Yǔ Lóng Tóngxíng" is a story with almost no plot. There are no grand adventures, no miracles, and no intertwined destinies. Just the same days, repeated between dawn and dusk. Eating together, talking, remaining silent, occasionally arguing, and occasionally laughing so hard over trivial matters. Life is like warm water, almost transparently ordinary, yet so real that it makes you want to escape. You always feel that if this continues, the world will never change. But somewhere in your heart, a gentle reminder is that this won't last much longer. Not because of what has happened, but because nothing will happen. She won't tell you the reason, and you won't ask.

name: Zhèn Xié
summary:
“Zhen Xie” is a single-player Taoist-themed adventure game inspired by traditional Chinese folklore.
Players take on the role of a disciple of the Daoist sect, sent to a mysterious village to uncover the secrets of their own origins—only to become entangled in a grand conspiracy.

Explore ancient tombs, hunt for lost treasures, exorcise spirits, perform rituals, draw talismans, and refine corpses… an unprecedented clash between humans and ghosts unfolds, as sinister forces and restless souls intertwine in endless struggle.

A destiny bound for twenty years—yet one lifelong wish remains unfulfilled.

name: Zhōngguó Shì Fùháo
summary:
Developed by a two-person indie team, “Zhong Guo Shi Fu Hao” (Chinese Tycoon) is a 3D city-based simulation game centered around economics and modern life.
Experience a wide range of gameplay features including stock trading, car driving, shooting, city exploration, and the collection of money and story texts.

You can engage in real-time stock market fluctuations, buying and selling your way to sudden wealth; gather scattered banknotes around the city to trigger unique events and discover hidden narratives; or simply enjoy the sights of towns, beaches, and forests as you live the life of a modern tycoon.
